mapper.select: SELECT I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID, TO_CHAR(MAX(I.LIVE_DATE),'DD-MON-YYYY') LIVE_DATE, MAX(NVL(I.LDESC,'N/A')) LDESC, MAX(NVL(I.SDESC,'N/A')) SDESC, MAX(I.FILE_SIZE) FILE_SIZE, MAX(PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME) PRICE_MODEL_NAME, MAX(IP.BEST_PRICE) BEST_PRICE, MAX(NVL(IP.RENEWAL_PRICE,0)) RENEWAL_PRICE, MIN(IT.DISPLAY_NAME) ITEM_TYPE, MIN(I.NETWORK_AWARE) NETWORK_AWARE, DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', 'IN',' ') PUB_FLAG, MAX(I.PHONE_PREVIEW_IMAGE) IMAGE_FILE, MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID, COUNT(I.ITEM_ID) noOfOrders FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_ITEM_PRICE IP, MF_ITEM_TYPE IT, MF_COMPANY C, MF_PRICE_MODEL PM WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.ITEM_ID = IP.ITEM_ID AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID = PM.PRICE_MODEL_ID AND I.ITEM_TYPE_ID = IT.ITEM_TYPE_ID GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID, DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', 'IN', ' ') ORDER BY I.DEVELOPER_NAME,I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT D.DEVICE_NAME FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_ITEM_DEVICE_GROUP IDG, MF_DEVICE_GROUP_MAP DGM, MF_DEVICE D WHERE I.COMPANY_ID = #{compId} AND I.DEVELOPER_NAME = #{devName} AND I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME = #{dispName} AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE <SYSDATE AND I.ITEM_ID = IDG.ITEM_ID AND IDG.DEVICE_GROUP_ID = DGM.DEVICE_GROUP_ID AND DGM.DEVICE_ID = D.DEVICE_ID ORDER BY DEVICE_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT PN.NODE_NAME FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC, PP_CAT_NODE PN WHERE I.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND IC.NODE_ID = PN.NODE_ID AND I.COMPANY_ID = #{compId} AND I.DEVELOPER_NAME = #{devName} AND I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME = #{dispName} AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY NODE_NAME

SELECT IT.DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NUMBER_OF_ITEMS FROM (SELECT MIN(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID, MIN(I.ITEM_TYPE_ID) ITEM_TYPE_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X, MF_ITEM_TYPE IT WHERE X.ITEM_TYPE_ID = IT.ITEM_TYPE_ID GROUP BY X.ITEM_TYPE_ID, IT.DISPLAY_NAME HAVING COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) > 0 ORDER BY IT.DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT CN.NODE_ID, CN.DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM PP_CAT_NODE CN, (SELECT IC.NODE_ID, MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID, IC.NODE_ID) X WHERE X.NODE_ID = CN.NODE_ID GROUP BY CN.DISPLAY_NAME, CN.NODE_ID ORDER BY CN.DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT MIN(D.DEVICE_ID) DEVICE_ID,D.DEVICE_NAME, COUNT(DI.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM MF_DEVICE D, MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C, (SELECT DISTINCT DGM.DEVICE_ID, IDG.ITEM_ID FROM MF_DEVICE_GROUP_MAP DGM, MF_ITEM_DEVICE_GROUP IDG WHERE DGM.DEVICE_GROUP_ID = IDG.DEVICE_GROUP_ID) DI WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND D.DEVICE_ID = DI.DEVICE_ID AND DI.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID GROUP BY D.DEVICE_NAME ORDER BY D.DEVICE_NAME

SELECT PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM MF_ITEM_PRICE IP, MF_PRICE_MODEL PM, (SELECT MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X WHERE X.ITEM_ID = IP.ITEM_ID AND PM.PRICE_MODEL_ID = IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID GROUP BY PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME, IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID ORDER BY PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT BEST_PRICE,COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM MF_ITEM_PRICE IP, (SELECT MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND IC.NODE_ID = #{catId} AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X WHERE X.ITEM_ID = IP.ITEM_ID AND IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID <> #{pmId} GROUP BY BEST_PRICE ORDER BY BEST_PRICE DESC
SELECT DISTINCT BEST_PRICE FROM MF_ITEM_PRICE WHERE BEST_PRICE > 0 ORDER BY 1
mapper.sql: AND O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(TO_DATE(#{startDate, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.DateTypeHandler} || ' 00:00:00', 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS TIMESTAMP), '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${serverTimeZone}', 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss'), 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(TO_DATE(#{endDate, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.DateTypeHandler} || ' 23:59:59', 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS TIMESTAMP), '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${serverTimeZone}', 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss'), 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss')
mapper.select: SELECT D.DEVICE_NAME, CN.DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM PP_CAT_NODE CN, MF_DEVICE D, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC, (SELECT MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X, (SELECT DISTINCT DGM.DEVICE_ID, IDG.ITEM_ID FROM MF_DEVICE_GROUP_MAP DGM, MF_ITEM_DEVICE_GROUP IDG WHERE DGM.DEVICE_GROUP_ID = IDG.DEVICE_GROUP_ID) DI WHERE DI.ITEM_ID = X.ITEM_ID AND DI.DEVICE_ID = D.DEVICE_ID AND X.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND IC.NODE_ID = CN.NODE_ID GROUP BY D.DEVICE_NAME, CN.DISPLAY_NAME ORDER BY D.DEVICE_NAME, CN.DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT INV_MONTH, INV_DAY, CITY_CIRCLE, DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, ORD_COUNT, 0.015 EMP_DED_PCT, EMP_DED, NET_ORD_COUNT, 0.5 EUP, GROSS_SALES, TAX_RATE WPC, GROSS_SALES AFTER_WPC_SALES FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(O.ORDER_DATE AS TIMESTAMP), '${serverTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}', 'MM-YYYY') INV_MONTH, TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(O.ORDER_DATE AS TIMESTAMP), '${serverTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}', 'DD/MM/YYYY') INV_DAY, CW.CITY_CIRCLE,CW.TAX_RATE/100 TAX_RATE, O.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) ORD_COUNT, ROUND(COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) * 0.015) EMP_DED, (COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) - ROUND(COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) * 0.015)) NET_ORD_COUNT, ((COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) - ROUND(COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) * 0.015)) * 0.5) GROSS_SALES FROM MF_ORDER O, CIRCLE_LOOKUP CW, MF_ITEM I WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PTN, 1, 7)) BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(CW.RANGE_START) AND TO_NUMBER(CW.RANGE_END) AND O.ORDER_TYPE IS NULL AND O.PRICE_MODEL_ID = 1005 AND O.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID AND I.NETWORK_AWARE = 1
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(O.ORDER_DATE AS TIMESTAMP), '${serverTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}', 'MM-YYYY'), TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(O.ORDER_DATE AS TIMESTAMP), '${serverTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}', 'DD/MM/YYYY'), CW.CITY_CIRCLE, CW.TAX_RATE/100, O.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME ) ORDER BY CITY_CIRCLE, INV_DAY, DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT CW.CITY_CIRCLE, O.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(O.ORDER_ID) ORD_COUNT, SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) GROSS_SALES, 0.015 EMP_DED_PCT, (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015) EMP_DED, (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) - (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015)) NET_ORD_Sales, (CW.TAX_RATE/100) WPC_TELKOM, ((SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) - (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015)) * (CW.TAX_RATE/100)) WPC_TELKOM_FEE, (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) - (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015)) - ((SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) - (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015)) * (CW.TAX_RATE/100)) AFTER_WPC_FEE, 0.4 totalRevPct, ((SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) - (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015)) - ((SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) - (SUM(O.ORDER_TOTAL) * 0.015)) * (CW.TAX_RATE/100))) * 0.4 carrierInvoice FROM MF_ORDER O, CIRCLE_LOOKUP CW WHERE TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PTN, 1, 7)) BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(CW.RANGE_START) AND TO_NUMBER(CW.RANGE_END) AND O.ORDER_TYPE IS NULL AND O.PRICE_MODEL_ID <> 1005
GROUP BY CW.CITY_CIRCLE,CW.TAX_RATE/100, O.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME ORDER BY CITY_CIRCLE, DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME
mapper.sql:
SELECT FROM_TZ(CAST(O.ORDER_DATE AS TIMESTAMP), '${serverTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}' ORDER_DATE, O.COMPANY_NAME, O.ITEM_ID, I.NETWORK_AWARE, O.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME ITEM_NAME, IT.ITEM_TYPE_NAME, DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', 'direct', 'indirect') DIRECT_FLAG, O.ORDER_TOTAL, (#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL) NET_SALES, ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)) NET_SALES_CRT, CASE WHEN ORDER_TOTAL = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_ZERO, CASE WHEN ORDER_TOTAL = 0 AND I.NETWORK_AWARE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_ZERO_NWA,
CASE WHEN ORDER_TOTAL < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_REFUND, CASE WHEN ORDER_TOTAL > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_ORDER, NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE2, 0) CS_PCT,
DECODE ((#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0),0)) CM_PCT,
DECODE ((#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0),0)) CP_PCT,
(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE2, 0) / 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)) CARRIR_SHARE,
DECODE ((#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)) ,0)) CM_SHARE,
DECODE ((#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0) / 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0) / 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)) ,0)) CP_SHARE,
(((NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)))+ ((NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0)/ 100) * ((#{carrier.taxRate} * O.ORDER_TOTAL)*((100-#{currencyConversion})/100)))) CARRIER_INVOICE
FROM MF_ORDER O, MF_ITEM_TYPE IT, MF_COMPANY C, MF_SETTLEMENT S, MF_ITEM I WHERE O.ORDER_TYPE IS NULL AND O.ITEM_TYPE_ID = IT.ITEM_TYPE_ID AND O.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID AND O.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID
AND O.PRICE_MODEL_ID <> #{yelement}
AND NVL(O.SETTLEMENT_ID, 0) = S.ID(+)
